concept.title: Impala Documentation Errata

conbody.p: This page shows changes in the Impala documentation. These different views are experiments to see what kind(s) of representation are most helpful. Some changes are tied to a release. Other improvements are the result of a particular JIRA issue and have been backported to multiple releases where appropriate.

concept.title: Changes by Release

conbody.p: This section shows recent releases of CDH and corresponding Impala releases, and the documentation pages that have substantial changes for each release.

concept.title: CDH 5.8 / Impala 2.6.0
CDH 5.7 / Impala 2.5.0
CDH 5.5 / Impala 2.3.0
CDH 5.4 / Impala 2.2.3
CDH 5.4 / Impala 2.2.0
CDH 5.3 / Impala 2.1.0
CDH 5.2 / Impala 2.0.1
CDH 5.2 / Impala 2.0.0
Changes by JIRA Issue

conbody.p: This section lists Impala-related issues from the Impala issue-tracking system. These items represent new features, fixes for documentation bugs, and workarounds and notices for code bugs or limitations. The same text may be reused in identical form on multiple pages. Use this section to cross-check the documentation changes for feature requests and problem reports, and to see the details in the issue-tracking system for features and fixes that are only mentioned briefly in the documentation, such as performance improvements that do not require any user tuning actions.

concept.title: IMPALA-3732: Avro scanner can break on strings >= 2GB
IMPALA-3679: Zero copy reads don't work with encryption zones
IMPALA-3662: Parquet scanner memory increase after IMPALA-2736
IMPALA-3581: Change Default Minidump Location to /var/log/$daemon
IMPALA-3558: DROP TABLE PURGE on S3A table may not delete externally written files
IMPALA-3554: Use catalog's principal to talk to sentry in kerberized Impala clusters
IMPALA-3490: Add Flag to Cap Maximum Minidump Size
IMPALA-3480: Add query options to set min / max filter sizes
IMPALA-3471: TopN should be able to spill
IMPALA-3453: S3 : Uneven split sizes are generated for Parquet causing execution skew
IMPALA-3452: S3: Disable Impala staging for INSERTs via flag for speedup
IMPALA-3439: Error choosing function signature in ROUND()
IMPALA-3397: Support SOURCE <file> in shell
IMPALA-3375: Investigate expensive calls to tc_delete_nothrow & tc_new during TopN for 2x speedup.
IMPALA-3369: Add a variant of alter table to manually add column stats
IMPALA-3333: Enable global runtime filtering by default
IMPALA-3232: Allow table refs in subqueries to refer to WITH-clause view in parent block.
IMPALA-3199: Enable Admission Control by default (without limits)
IMPALA-3163: DECIMAL casting to a TIMESTAMP doesn't keep precision
IMPALA-3155: CHAR expression in case statement is implicitly cast to string
IMPALA-3095: Allow additional Kerberos users to be authorized to access internal APIs
IMPALA-3092: Cannot query tables after add columns for AVRO table
IMPALA-3077: Runtime filters should be retained even when spilling
IMPALA-3054: Runtime filters are not disabled when spilling in a rare case
IMPALA-3046: Allow per-row filters to evaluate non-SlotRef exprs
IMPALA-3044: Fix admission control default value for max requests
IMPALA-3039: Restrict the number of runtime filters generated
IMPALA-3008: Improve printing of filter routing table
IMPALA-3007: Use planner cardinality estimates when sizing bloom filters
IMPALA-3001: Improve usability of RUNTIME_FILTER query options
IMPALA-2956: Filters should be able to target multiple scans
IMPALA-2867: Load data inpath chokes on impala staging directories
IMPALA-2844: Select count(*) from RCFileTable throw NotImplementedException in Impala 2.3.0
IMPALA-2843: Impala should read java udfs created from Hive
IMPALA-2835: Hive/Impala inconsistency with parquet.column.index.access=false
IMPALA-2749: Impala returns NULL when decimal and double values are multiplied in a specific order
IMPALA-2736: Column-wise value materialisation in Parquet scanner
IMPALA-2728: TestTpchMemLimitError.test_low_mem_limit_q21 exceeds mem_limit of 700M
IMPALA-2696: Simple scheduler always uses the same replica which can create hot spots
IMPALA-2688: Group by on Decimal data type doesn't get CodeGened
IMPALA-2686: Implement google BreakPad based crash handler for impala.
IMPALA-2681: Improve Decimal arithmetic performance by using a cheaper overflow check
IMPALA-2660: Respect auth_to_local rules from hdfs configs (core-site.xml)
IMPALA-2641: Add IF EXISTS clause to TRUNCATE TABLE statement
IMPALA-2599: Pseudo-random sleep before acquiring kerberos ticket possibly not really pseudo-random.
IMPALA-2560: Large memory consumption on coordinator node when handling a large number of partitions due to redundancy in TDescriptorTable
IMPALA-2552: Runtime filter forwarding between operators
IMPALA-2538: Per-pool default query memory limits
IMPALA-2499: Min/max values on partition columns
IMPALA-2419: Extend Probe filter implementation
IMPALA-2382: Impala unable to read Java based UDFs that return a standard datatype like Float or String(This works in hive)
IMPALA-2336: Failure to execute SQL scripts with trailing comments (including comment-only scripts)
IMPALA-2257: Text delimiter breaks data loading build
IMPALA-2251: Impala allows creation of text tables with same row and field delimiter
IMPALA-2233: Impala should not choose a function signature that results in loss of precision
IMPALA-2204: Underscore in where does not work for multi-line text
IMPALA-2196: Add support for DESCRIBE DATABASE similar to Hive
IMPALA-2180: IMPALA-2180: Extend SET command to allow setting variables in Impala Shell.
IMPALA-2179: IMPALA-2179: Extend Impala shell to allow passing variables through the command line
IMPALA-2147: Support for null-safe equal/IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM
IMPALA-2130: hdfs-parquet-scanner's verification of file version is not correct
IMPALA-2111: Parquet TIMESTAMP is in milliseconds
IMPALA-2070: Include the database comment when showing databases
IMPALA-2069: Cannot write string column to parquet with UTF-8 annotation
IMPALA-1934: impala-shell to support reading password from command line when LDAP authentication is used
IMPALA-1881: Maximize data locality when scanning Parquet files with multiple row groups.
IMPALA-1878: Support INSERT and LOAD DATA to S3
IMPALA-1787: Case-insensitivity modifier for regular expressions
IMPALA-1772: Additional date / time fns
IMPALA-1771: Hyperbolic trig fns etc.
IMPALA-1755: Disabling codegen on parquet scanner causes some queries' performance to regress
IMPALA-1748: Provide support for registering permanent udfs
IMPALA-1740: Impala cannot deal with skip.header.line.count
IMPALA-1675: Timestamp: Adding/subtracting very large time intervals to timestamps produces incorrect result
IMPALA-1651: CREATE TABLE LIKE should not copy caching directives of the source table.
IMPALA-1599: Improve query start-up time with many fragment instances
IMPALA-1588: Cache HDFS file handle to avoid repeated hdfs fopen call
IMPALA-1568: Find / repair missing partitions command
IMPALA-1480: Slow DDL statements for tables with large number of partitions
IMPALA-1477: Add UUID function
IMPALA-1305: Improve performance of high cardinality / low reduction aggs
IMPALA-1168: Finer grain Admission Control timeout control
IMPALA-1139: Implement TRUNCATE TABLE statement
IMPALA-1079: Impalad crashes while trying to run tpcds-q34
IMPALA-1067: Passing Arguments through Impala Shell
